moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Nightmare
moves.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

moves.name: Switcheroo
moves.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Synchronoise
moves.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.
